AUTH_errorEmail: Please enter a valid email address
BROKERS_description: Choose a broker to connect to
BROKERS_SESSION_WARNING: Broker pages are only available for logged-in users.
BROKERS_INTRO: In the Broker section, strategies can be individually tested, saved, and managed. The test data is based on historical market data from the selected broker. After a successful test, the strategy can be executed on an individual Alpaca paper account to test it risk-free in practice.
BROKERS_STEP_1_DESC: Select the 'Strategy Test' option from the menu to create a new simulation.
BROKERS_STEP_2_DESC: Select a strategy from the list.
BROKERS_STEP_3_DESC: Adjust the strategy parameters such as StopLoss and TakeProfit. The parameters vary depending on the strategy. A brief explanation of the strategy is displayed when you click the info button.
BROKERS_STEP_4_DESC: Start the test based on historical data. The test process may take some time depending on the data volume.
BROKERS_STEP_5_DESC: Analyze the test results using the reports and charts.
BROKERS_STEP_6_DESC: Mark the strategy as a favorite so that it is displayed on the dashboard. Bookmarks are not deleted.
BROKERS_STEP_7_TITLE: Execute Strategy on Alpaca Paper Account
BROKERS_STEP_7_DESC: Connect your Alpaca paper account and execute the strategy there. Registration with Alpaca is required for this. You will receive a key and secret, which you need to enter under the 'Execution' menu item. Regularly check the performance to make adjustments if necessary.
BROKERS_STEP_8_DESC: Stop the strategy if you no longer want to execute it.
